content.rendered:
Where are you flying? Economy Class Business Class
Economy Breaking Deals & Saver Economy Value & Freedom All Business  Class
Mauritius/Seychelles/Madagascar To Europe/Middle East/Africa/Asia 2pc x 23kgs 2pc x 23kgs 2pc x 32kgs
All journeys To Africa (Excl. South Africa & Seychelles) 2pc x 23kgs 2pc x 23kgs 2pc x 32kgs
All Journeys To/from USA & Canada 2pc x 23kgs 2pc x 23kgs 2pc x 32kgs
All Journeys To/from Brazil 2pc x 32kgs 2pc x 32kgs 2pc x 32kgs
To/from all other destinations 1pc of 23kgs 2pc of 23kgs 2pc of 32kgs

For more details visit : https://www.airseychelles.com/english/Baggage/Baggage-Information

Air Seychelles Hand | Cabin Baggage

Air Seychelles Excess Baggage
